item.title: 以逆向的方式分析QSEE TA中的组件
item.description: TA链接的组件 位于trustzone_images/core/bsp/trustzone/qsapps/applib64/ （64bit） 其中

item.title: 浅析一加6手机上的QSEE
item.description: Refer com.qualcomm.qti.qdma 简单介绍 The Road to Qualcomm TrustZone Apps Fuzzing [PDF] [RECON Montreal 2019] Qualcomm-Secure Boot and Image Authentication Technical Overview (v2.0) also v1.0 version PartEmu: Enabling Dynamic Analysis of Real-World TrustZone SoftwareUsing Emulation [USENIX 20] https://gtoad.github.io/2019/11/26/TEE-CVE-2015-6639/ Keypoints 缩写 部分参考自Refer[1] QSEE: Qualcomm Secure Execution Environment (TZ versions 4.x, 3.x, and 2.x) QTEE: Qualcomm Trusted
